TopicTitle: Tiny kraken effect on reload of a station

Articles.Content:
So I was fixing up my Apollo project for release, when I noted a strange bug with the Skylab replica. It's deliver as one package trough use of some clipping/offset (see picture), and then assembled in orbit. Nothing wrong so far. but when the craft is reloaded (as when I came in with the Apollo CSM) it starts behaving weirdly. I did some tests and the bug replicates without flaw, assembly goes smooth, but on reload it starts to freaks out, like so:

Once both beams are undocked again (resulting in a massive cloud of solar panel debris), the station returns to normal. It's something in the beams themselves, as other ships can dock wit the side ports without problems on reload.

Here you can see how the solar panel beams are attached on launch:

The craft itself is completely stock, but since it isn't a stock install, these are the mods I have:

Mechjeb 2

RCS Build Aid

Editor Extensions

Tweakalble Everything

Toolbar

Docking Port Alignment

Trajectories

I don't think it has anything to with mods though, as what I could grasp from the log, it has something to do with invalid nodes or something.
